tool_description: Input an image URL and get a detailed description of the image as if a human is telling you what's in the image.
name: Image Description & Caption
title: Image Description & Caption

api_list.name: Image description
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-description-caption.p.rapidapi.com/image-description"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-description-caption.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-description-caption.p.rapidapi.com/image-description"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-description-caption.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
